original_text: “‘Listen, High Priest Joshua, you and your associates seated before you, who are men symbolic of things to come: I am going to bring my servant, the Branch.
korean_text: 대제사장 여호수아야 너와 네 앞에 앉은 네 동료들은 내 말을 들을 것이니라 이들은 예표의 사람들이라 내가 내 종 싹을 나게 하리라

sentences.original_text: you and your associates seated before you
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 네 앞에 앉은 네 동료들

sentences.original_text: who are men symbolic of things to come
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 장차 일어날 일을 상징하는 사람들

sentences.original_text: I am going to bring my servant
